Coccidioidomycosis (Tests for Coccidioides species Nucleic Acid)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    48588-8 Coccidioides sp rRNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    4994-0 Coccidioides immitis rRNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Probe
